items.title: Metadata Driven
items.desc: Model metadata, field metadata, interface metadata, etc. Metadata versioning and multi-environment publishing

items.title: Flow
items.desc: Automation flows, business processes, scheduled task flows. Built-in AI integration and interaction capabilities.

items.title: OpenAPI
items.desc: Standard OpenAPI, AI-understandable API, Swagger API documentation.

items.title: Security Control
items.desc: ABAC fine-grained access control, row-level and field-level security, data encryption and masking, user security policies, etc.

items.title: Data Integration
items.desc: Configurable data integration capabilities, API orchestration capabilities, common integration authentication.

items.title: Timeline Model
items.desc: Configurable timeline model, supports querying data by effective date, business event tracking.

items.title: Multi-language
items.desc: Interface localization, message localization, business data localization.

items.title: Multi-database
items.desc: Supports mainstream relational databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, etc., with database dialect abstraction.

items.title: Multi-tenancy
items.desc: Supports multi-tenant sharing of schemas, intended for standardized SaaS scenarios only.
